title: e-con Systems launches Darsi Pro edge AI vision box powered by NVIDIA Jetson
description:
e-con Systems designed Darsi Pro for multi-sensor connectivity and cloud-based device management for robotics and other uses.

The post e-con Systems launches Darsi Pro edge AI vision box powered by NVIDIA Jetson appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
